dannan ithin liyanne awareta pol watenawa wage thamayi..eeth thamath ara falo karana ekayi koment korana ekayinan eda wagemayi..kohe giyath unda koment korala athi...samahara welawata ooya kohe hari desapalana lipiyak kiyawala mage age mayil ismayil wela pata pata gala yanawa koment boks eka hoyagena dennan komentuwak kiyala..koheda ee yanakota menna innawa dukath..ane meka pakshawa koment kola thanaka aaye wiruddhawa mukuth kiyawanta bahane kiyala ara giyata wada wegayen aapahu enawa oon...therenawane api denna koyithara miththarayo unath adahas wenas kiyala..eeth ee adahas ape miththara kan madden thappa bandala naha ada me wena thurawata..eekayi dukage wenasa...ee lagata oya wagema thawa parana hadayo dennek gana kiyanna oona..un denna thama mata ee dawaswala blog liyanakota athi wechcha thakshanika gataluwalata bohoma udaw upakara kole..untanan mathaka dath manda..eeth udaw gaththa mata amathaka naha..ee thama indare saha sakunthala dabala aththatama ookun denna mata bohoma udawwak una ee dawaswala.ee wagemayi ee kale hitiya wal hawek uunan adatath innawa eeth panaha gahawuweth me eeye pereda...hitha gaththakine mansge liyanna thiyena unanduwa kohomada kiyala..eeth eda idala me wenakalma man kiyawana ekek thama oya baniyage wikarath.ee wagemayi mali saha ninuwa...
sangha samajayata nawa arthakathanayak labi athi wakawanuwaka sanghayan marwinta kade yama hara wena kumak karanna da?
ara “natha” yana eka “atha” yana ekata wada sira na.

janadhipathi lekam lalith wirathunga mahatha widesha katayuthu amathyanshaye di rajya thanthrikayan pereda (05) hamu wi rajaya me sambandhayen kriyakaramin sitina aakaraya pilibandawa owun danuwath ෙkaleya.uthuru palathe idam gatalu wimarshanayata idam komasariswarayage pradhanathwayen baladhari mandalayak pathkara athayi lalith wirathunga mahatha ehidi pawasiya.awathanwuwan yali padinchi karawimata rajaya gena giya sarthaka wadapiliwela pilibandawa da rajya thanthrikayan mehidi danuwath kerina.dwibhasha prawinathawaya sandaha gena athi kriya marga da wisthara kerina.
ee aadaraya age kola sitha thula athikala thigasmak wage.
ee mewara sinhala aluth awurudda udawanne this wasaraka bihisunu yuddhayen bindunu sinhala, demala hadawath suwapath karannata osu soyana mohothakawima nisaya.
samahara wita ee mohotha kumakdayi kiya ohu niwaradiwama nodannawa wiya hakiyi.

mita wasara 30 kata pera, obata sawan dun shrawakayan kiyanawa, obe katahanda, eda wasara 30 kata pera thibunu katahandama, adath oba rakagena thibena bawa, me thaththwaya rakagannata obe katahandata kisiyam abhyasayak (hada puhunrawak) karanawada?

pariththa ho parithra yana wachana walin swalpaya yana arthayath, aarakshawa yana arthayath idiripath wana athara, piritha yana sinhala swarupayata pathwimedi aarakshawa yana artha yam wadath mulika wi thibe.
sathiye suba dina – irida, sanduda,
athiwena de wenaswenawa.wenas wana de abhawayata yanawa.

tayitanik, aago wani sinamapatawala da wiktarge ranganayan daka gatha haki wiya.* ‘da mesaya’ (1975) – piyar mariya rosiohuge kulundul ranganaya athulath wuye me sinamapatayatayi.* ‘da mesaya’ (2007) – irana nalu ahamad sulemani niya.* ‘jisas of nasarath’ - robat pawaldan hata nawa hawiridiya.

game wesena tharuna, tharuniyanta pariganaka puhunuwa ha ingi්rasi puhunuwa laba dime katayuthu widatha sampath madhyasthana mangin sidukara gena yanawa.dompe shashri lanka nidahas pakshaye pradhana sanwidhayaka, basnahara palath sabha manthri upali gunarathna mahatha - mahinda chinthanaya yatathe gramiya aarthikaya sawimath kirimata widatha sampath madhyasthana magin sidu kerenawa.pasugiya janadhipathiwaranaye di basnahira palathen wadima chanda prathishathayak laba dunne dompe janathawayi.me uthsawa sabhawe di widya ha thakshana amathyanshaye hitapu lekam anil amarathunga, dompe pradeshiya lekam chandani gunathilaka, sahakara lekam aar. ee. an. kumari, mahathma mahathmihu da katha kalaha.uthsawaya awasanaye di 2008, 2009 yana warshawala di pariganaka patamalawalin samarthaya labu shishya, shishyawanta sahathika pathra pirinamima amathiwaraya saha aaradhitha amuththan athin sidu kerini.
mudal amathyashayawath maha bankuwawath eewata katayuthu karanne naha.

wruththiya samithi kriyamargaya sambandhayen thiranathmaka sakachchawak ada udasana pawathwimata da dumriya wruththiya samithi salasum kara athi athara siya wruththiya samithi kriyamargaya sambandhayen ada derana samaga adahas dakwu dumriya sewa wruththiya samithi samuhika sandhanaye kandawumkaru janaka pranandu mahatha kiya sitiye pradhana karunu 4k mul karaganimin sanketha wadawarjanaya kriyathmaka karana bawayi.
